LanguageData.WaterShallow-WaterDeep.label: deep water from shallow water
LanguageData.WaterShallow-WaterDeep.description:
PLACE ON: Shallow Water.
RESULT: Deep Water.
GAIN: Ten Piles of Dirt.

NOTE: Placing impassable terrain on the map is overpowered and potentially game-breaking. Use with caution!

LanguageData.WaterShallow-WaterDeep_Frame.label: deep water from shallow water (building)

PLACE ON: Shallow Water.
RESULT: Deep Water.
GAIN: Ten Piles of Dirt.

NOTE: Placing impassable terrain on the map is overpowered and potentially game-breaking. Use with caution!
LanguageData.Stone-Topsoil.label: topsoil
LanguageData.Stone-Topsoil.description:
PLACE ON: Smooth Stone.
RESULT: Topsoil.

NOTE: Unlike most terrain types, topsoil can be removed with the "Remove Floor" tool。

LanguageData.Stone-Topsoil_Frame.label: topsoil (building)
LanguageData.Stone-Topsoil_Frame.description:
PLACE ON: Smooth Stone.
RESULT: Topsoil.

NOTE: Unlike most terrain types, topsoil can be removed with the "Remove Floor" tool。
LanguageData.Topsoil-DirtFert.label: fertilized topsoil
LanguageData.Topsoil-DirtFert.description:
PLACE ON: Topsoil.
RESULT: Fertilized Topsoil.

NOTE: Like regular topsoil, fertilized topsoil can be removed with the "Remove Floor" tool。

LanguageData.Topsoil-DirtFert_Frame.label: fertilized topsoil (building)
LanguageData.Topsoil-DirtFert_Frame.description:
PLACE ON: Topsoil.
RESULT: Fertilized Topsoil.

NOTE: Like regular topsoil, fertilized topsoil can be removed with the "Remove Floor" tool。
